radiographic_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is non-distended; however, there is extensive gallbladder wall edema and thickening up to 15 mm. There is cholelithiasis. A sonographic ___ sign was negative. The liver demonstrates normal echotexture without focal liver lesions. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation is present. The CBD is not dilated measuring up to 4 mm. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No significant free fluid is seen. The pancreas is not well visualized. Limited views of the right kidney are unremarkable.
